p.d: The body of Sylvain Théron, participating in a gold washing course, is found on the riverbank. In the very secret world of gold, discretion is all and no-one is prepared to talk to the police. To try to advance the investigation, Léa decides to infiltrate a member of her team... Directed by: Lionel Chatton (season 3, France, 2018) Screenplay: Philippe Lyon Cast: Astrid Veillon (Léa Soler), Stéphane Blancafort (Paul Marchal), Piérick Tournier (Erwan), Nelly Lawson (Camille), François Dominique Blin (Franck Marvaud), Sarah-Cheyenne (Alice), Guillemette Barioz (Sophie Vannier), Titouan Laporte (Thomas), David Marchal (Vauvert), Romain Debouchaud (Julien Garrido), Pascal Gimenez (Grégory), Laurent Giroud (Lucky), Marine Collet (Nathalie Théron) Genre: detective
